  usable in:

    # code, optional

[local] condition:
  usable in:
    # events, optional
  patterns:
    # patterns, one per line
  parse:
    # code, optional

[local] <skript type> property condition <pattern>:
  usable in:
    # events, optional
  parse:
    # code, optional
  check:
    # code, required

condition example:
  parse:
    set {_test} to 1
    continue
  check:
    # {_test} always starts at 1 here
    add 1 to {_test}
    # 2 is always broadcast
    broadcast "%{_test}%"
